channel.title: NewPirateOfUASea's blog
channel.description: I write on tech and whatnot

item.title: Zoomer thoughts on RSS
item.description: My rant about RSS and a few words about TUI
item.content:encoded:
On RSS

RSS saves me so much time! I no longer spend time looking at recommendations on YouTube, etc., but only follow the people I really care about. Well, that's why i decided to use @nuxtjs/feed in this project.

By the way, I use Newsboat. The main reason i use TUI applications whenever it's possible, is because those app are keyboard-driven, which is much better for your wrist health
